annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Union
annotations.translation: 欧盟官方公报

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 416/2004
annotations.translation: 委员会 (EC) 第 416/2004 号条例

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: of 5 March 2004

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: laying down transitional measures for the application of Council Regulation (EC) No 2201/96 and Regulation (EC) No 1535/2003 by reason of the accession of the Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia to the European Union
annotations.translation: 由于捷克共和国、爱沙尼亚、塞浦路斯、拉脱维亚、立陶宛、匈牙利、马耳他、波兰、斯洛文尼亚和斯洛伐克加入欧盟，制定了适用理事会 (EC) 第 2201/96 号条例和 (EC) 第 1535/2003 号条例的过渡措施

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体委员会，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
annotations.translation: 考虑到《建立欧洲共同体条约》，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Treaty of Accession of the Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia, and in particular Article 2(3) thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到捷克共和国、爱沙尼亚、塞浦路斯、拉脱维亚、立陶宛、匈牙利、马耳他、波兰、斯洛文尼亚和斯洛伐克的《加入条约》，特别是其中第 2(3) 条，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Act of Accession of the Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia, and in particular the first paragraph of Article 41 thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到捷克共和国、爱沙尼亚、塞浦路斯、拉脱维亚、立陶宛、匈牙利、马耳他、波兰、斯洛文尼亚和斯洛伐克的《加入条约》，特别是其中第 41 条第一段，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas:
annotations.translation: 鉴于：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (1) Transitional measures should be adopted to allow producers and processors in the Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia (hereafter the new Member States) to benefit from the provisions of Council Regulation (EC) No 2201/96 of 28 October 1996 on the common organisation of the markets in processed fruit and vegetable products (¹).
annotations.translation: (1) 应采取过渡措施，使捷克共和国、爱沙尼亚、塞浦路斯、拉脱维亚、立陶宛、匈牙 利、马耳他、波兰、斯洛文尼亚和斯洛伐克（以下简称新成员国）的生产商和加工商能够受益于 1996 年 10 月 28 日理事会关于共同组织加工水果和蔬菜产品市场的 (EC) 第 2201/96 号条例的规定 (¹)。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2 Under Commission Regulation (EC) No 1535/2003 of 29 August 2003 laying down detailed rules for applying Council Regulation (EC) No 2201/96 as regards the aid scheme for products processed from fruit and vegetables (2) contracts must be concluded for tomatoes, peaches and pears between processors approved by the competent authorities and producer organisations granted recognition or preliminary recognition. A temporary derogation should be made from the time table for concluding contracts laid down in Regulation (EC) No 1535/2003. Otherwise, and particularly in the case of tomatoes, for which contracts must be concluded before 15 February, the parties concerned would be unable to benefit from the aid scheme during the first marketing year.
annotations.translation: 2. 根据 2003 年 8 月 29 日委员会 (EC) 第 1535/2003 号条例，该条例规定了适用理事会 (EC) 第 2201/96 号条例关于水果和蔬菜加工产品援助计划的的细则 (2)，对于西红柿、桃和梨，主管机构批准的加工商与获得认可或初步认可的生产组织之间必须签订合同。(EC) 第 1535/2003 号条例规定的订立合同的时间表应作暂时克减。否则，特别是在 2 月 15 日之前必须签订西红柿合同的情况下，有关各方将无法在首个销售年度从援助计划中获益。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (3) The mechanism for examining compliance with the national processing thresholds provided for in Article 5 of Regulation (EC) No 2201/96 does not apply immediately to the new Member States. Transitional measures for its application should therefore be laid down. For the first marketing year of application, for which there are no data for the calculation, the aid should be paid in full. However, as a precautionary measure, a prior reduction should be made to be reimbursed if there is no
annotations.translation: (3) (EC) 第 2201/96 号条例第 5 条规定的国家处理阈值遵守情况的机制不立即适用于新成员国。因此，应制定适用该机制的过渡措施。对于申请的没有计算数据的首个销售年度，应全额支付援助。但是，作为预防措施，应事先扣减补贴，如果没有

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (1) OJ L 297, 21.11.1996, p. 29. Regulation as last amended by Commission Regulation (EC) No 453/2002 (OJ L 72, 14.3.2002, p. 9).
annotations.translation: (1) OJ L 297，1996 年 11 月 21 日，第 29 页。经委员会 (EC) 第 453/2002 号条例（OJ L 72，2002 年 3 月 14 日，第 9 页）最后修正的条例。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: overrun at the end of the marketing year. For subsequent marketing years, provision should be made for the gradual application of the system for examining compliance with the threshold.
annotations.translation: 在销售年度结束时超支。在随后的销售年度，应规定逐步适用阈值遵守情况的制度。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (4) Since the aid for tomatoes is published in the January preceding the marketing year concerned , transitional measures should also be laid down for examining compliance with the threshold for the purposes of fixing the level of aid for the 2007/08 marketing year.
annotations.translation: (4) 由于西红柿援助计划是在有关销售年度之前的一月份公布的，因此也应制定过渡措施，以审查是否符合阈值，从而确定 2007/08 销售年度的援助水平。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (5) The measures provided for in this Regulation are in accordance with the opinion of the Management Committee for Products Processed from Fruit and Vegetables,
annotations.translation: (5) 本条例规定的措施符合果蔬加工产品管理委员会的意见，

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: HAS ADOPTED THIS REGULATION:
annotations.translation: 已通过以下条例：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 1
annotations.translation: 第 1 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Notwithstanding Article 6(1)(a) of Regulation (EC) No 1535/2003, in the case of tomatoes in the Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia (hereafter the new Member States) during the 2004/05 marketing year, contracts between recognised producer organisations within the meaning of paragraph 1(1)(a) of the said Regulation and approved processors shall be concluded by 15 July and at least 10 days before deliveries are to commence.
annotations.translation: 尽管有 (EC) 第 1535/2003 号条例第 6(1)(a) 条的规定，对于捷克共和国、爱沙尼亚、塞浦路斯、拉脱维亚、立陶宛、匈牙利、马耳他、波兰、斯洛文尼亚和斯洛伐克（以下简称新成员国）在 2004/05 销售年度的西红柿，上述条例第 1(1)(a) 段所指的获认可的生产商组织与获批准的加工商之间的合同应在 7 月 15 日之前，并且至少在交付前 10 天签订。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 2
annotations.translation: 第 2 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: For the 2004/05 marketing year and for the new Member States, the aid provided for in Article 4(2) of Regulation (EC) No 2201/96 shall be:
annotations.translation: 对于 2004/05 销售年度和新成员国，(EC) 第 2201/96 号条例第 4(2) 条规定的援助应为：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: EUR 25,88/tonne for tomatoes,
annotations.translation: 西红柿 25.88 欧元/吨，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: EUR 35,78/tonne for peaches,

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: EUR 121,28/tonne for pears.

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 3
annotations.translation: 第 3 条

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. Where the examination of compliance with the threshold for the of fixing the aid for the 2005/06 marketing purpose year shows that the Community threshold has not been exceeded, an additional amount equal to 25 % of the aid provided for in Article 4(2) of Regulation (EC) No 2201/96 shall be paid in all the new Member States after the end of the 2004/05 marketing year.
annotations.translation: 1. 如果对 2005/06 销售年度援助额的确定是否符合阈值的审查结果表明没有超过共同体的阈值，则应在 2004/05 销售年度结束后向所有新成员国支付相当于 (EC) 第 2201/96 号条例第 4(2) 条规定的援助额的 25% 的额外金额。
